column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The place was really neat. However
column2: the structure really bothered me a little as it was confusing where we were heading to even when we were looking at the map. The place was really loud
column3: which seemed like the staff did not care about the noise level at all. The art work was good yet I wish they had more pieces of contemporary arts
column4: as I feel like I encountered more artisan works during the whole museum tour.
